name: List
description: The List component allows the user to add a standard list to an application.

properties.name: listItems
properties.handlerDescription: Specifies a JSON array containing data of the list items. Signature of items list: [ <Item> ]. Signature of item: { content: String, children: [ <Item> ] }.

properties.name: backgroundColor
properties.label: Background
properties.settingTooltip: Choose a background for the list

properties.name: width
properties.label: Width
properties.settingTooltip: Choose the width of the list

properties.name: color
properties.label: Color
properties.settingTooltip: Select the text color of the list items

properties.name: fontSize
properties.label: Font Size
properties.settingTooltip: Select the font size of the list items

properties.name: padding
properties.label: Padding
properties.settingTooltip: Select the padding for list items

eventHandlers.name: onClickListItem
eventHandlers.label: On Click List Item Event
eventHandlers.handlerDescription: This event is fired when the user clicks the mouse or taps the item of the list.

blockUI:
• unordered lists ( ul ) - the list items are marked with bullets
  • ordered lists ( ol ) - the list items are marked with numbers or letters
